SEARCH
Package boundary

Class SupervisorBoundary

java.lang.Object
utils.Base
boundary.BaseBoundary
boundary.UserBoundary
boundary.SupervisorBoundary
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoordinatorBoundary
public class SupervisorBoundary extends UserBoundary
The SupervisorBoundary class is responsible for handling interactions between the supervisor interface and the SupervisorController. It extends the UserBoundary class and inherits its methods.
Since:
2023-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Khoo Yong Hui
